divs: Sighting DetailsHusband and I were outside talking about the previous nights sighting of the UFO and it just appeared, coming from the NW moving in a slow steady direction to the SE, as it got futher away it just dimmed out, this time it did not hover, just slowly went by. I had my camcorder out with me, but by the time I grabbed it and tryed to focus in on it, it was gone, maybe next time Ill get it on film.
Summary: Bright glowing sphere traveling from NW to SE
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Decatur
There was one other sighting in Decatur on or around August 24th 2012
